Configure the type of audit trail

1 In the Auxiliary Tables folder, double-click Configuration Parameters.

2 In the Value column, click the cell next to the Disable creation of System Events Audit Trail option.

3 Enter 0 for a complete audit trail.

Enter 1 for a limited audit trail that will not record the following user actions:

} View census list

} Successful or unsuccessful user log on

} User log off

} Start and end of an interruption in device data reception

} Warning message about device data interruption

} Successful or unsuccessful automatic or manual e-mail message about device data interruption

} Open patient record

} Printout

4 Press Enter.
